data.event: In addition to the aforementioned, Riverside is home to Klein's Supermarket, now known as Shop Rite, the sole grocery store; plus Hair Cuttery, Riverside Pizzeria, Riverside Liquors, China Moon Chinese restaurant, Wye Knot Crabs, Bliss Coffee & Wine Bar, H&R Block, Rite-Aid, Subway and, in the summer, a snowball stand.

event.title: includes the following national restaurant chains: McDonald's, Burger King, Arby's, Waffle House, Cracker Barrel, Ruby Tuesday

data.event: Riverside also includes the following national restaurant chains: McDonald's, Burger King, Arby's, Waffle House, Cracker Barrel, Ruby Tuesday, and Pizza Hut.
